Class RFcipher

  • java.lang.Object
    • RFcipher

  • public class RFcipher
extends java.lang.Object
    Rail Fence Cipher Project

    A class that encrypts and decrypts text using the rail-fence cipher.

    Version:
    1 March 2017
    Author:
    18nleung

      Constructs a new RFcipher when a String argument is provided.
